newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish brewer Elbrewery to launch PLN 50 mln notes.
newsitem.headline: Polish brewer Elbrewery to launch PLN 50 mln notes.

text.p: Polish brewer Elbrewery Co Ltd, controlled by Australian firm Brewpole BV, will begin a 50-million-zloty notes issue on July 3, corporate affairs director Tomasz Chenczke said on Thursday.
He told a news conference the first tranche of the programme would offer notes worth from two to three million zlotys with a maturity of one to six months.
"We are launching a short-term notes programme...worth a total of 50 million zlotys. The programme is being carried out by Societe General," Chenczke said.
He said that by September Elbrewery would issue short-term notes worth a total of 30 million zlotys.
